Package com.teamfour.monopolish.gui.controllers

Class MessagePopupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamfour.monopolish.gui.controllers.MessagePopupController
  • public class MessagePopupController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for message popup GUI element. Will handle all timing logic for the popups, and display an animation on enter and leave. It is important to setup controller before using this class, the methods will not work before the setup. The class and its methods is designed to be used from anywhere in the application.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static void setup​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane container,
                         int delay)
        Setup the container for the messages. Should only be run once when using this class.
        Parameters:
        container - Target container for message popups
        delay - How long the message will be displayed before fading out.

      • show

        public static void show​(java.lang.String msg,
                        java.lang.String logoName,
                        java.lang.String title)
        Calling this method will display a message popup in the container defined in setup. A fade in and out animation will be displayed, the popups will stack on top of each other. After a delay the popup will fade out, this can be defined in setup.
        Parameters:
        msg - Displayed message in popup
        logoName - Filename of the target logo, must be located in src/res/gui/MessagePopup
        title - Title of the message popup

      • show

        public static void show​(java.lang.String msg)
        Calling this method will display a message popup in the container defined in setup. A fade in and out animation will be displayed, the popups will stack on top of each other. After a delay the popup will fade out, this can be defined in setup. Notice this method will display a standard info logo.
        Parameters:
        msg - Displayed message in popup

      • show

        public static void show​(java.lang.String msg,
                        java.lang.String logoName)
        Calling this method will display a message popup in the container defined in setup. A fade in and out animation will be displayed, the popups will stack on top of each other. After a delay the popup will fade out, this can be defined in setup. Notice this method will display a standard info logo.
        Parameters:
        msg - Displayed message in popup
        logoName - Filename of the target logo, must be located in src/res/gui/MessagePopup
